etymology.description: Depicts two bent lines indicating the original meaning of 'to divide'.
etymology.interpretation: The two bent lines suggest a division or separation, evoking the original meaning of the character.

examples.chinese: 我有八个苹果(我有八個蘋果)。
他的电话是八个数字(他的電話是八個數字)。
examples.pinyin: Tā de diànhuà shì bā gè shùzì.
examples.english: His phone number has eight digits.
